price: Rabbiin Barreesse "dhugumatti, Anaafi Ergamtoonni Kiyya ni mo'anna" (jechuun). Rabbiin Jabaa, Injifataadha.
arabic: كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَنَّ أَنَا۠ وَرُسُلِيٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kataba al-lahu la-aghlibanna anā warusulī inna al-laha qawiyyun ʿazīzun
